column4: i believe that it was vegombrei who asked you this question yesterday
you can compile 32 bit programs in a 64 bit host without a chroot cant you? since most are x86 64 they include the 32 bit libraries anyway
should be able to; haven't ever heard about using chroot for that purpose
well you typed !chroot at someone and it said "such as compiling 32 bit apps in a 64 bit os" which made me wonder if im wrong in assuming....
